description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.en: Tokoshie x Bullet - The Battle at Shin Minato
Tokoshie×Bullet The Battle at Shin Minato

altTitles.ja: 永久×バレット 新湊攻防戦
永久×バレット: 新湊攻防戦

description.en: In this story, unidentified giant weapons will destroy the world's metropolises in 2029. The masterminds of this unprecedented destruction are known as "Tokoshie". They call themselves weapons when they go out on the streets of the cities with their overwhelming powers and disappear as soon as they are done with them. A decade has passed since then. A certain military company is developing a combat drone with the ability to fight the Tokoshie, and a certain millionaire figure goes underground to discover the secret of the Tokoshie's eternal life. Another specific girl goes on a journey to fight the Tokoshie, sworn in as her parents' enemies. In short, this is the chronicle of an endless struggle between humanity and its greatest enemy ever.
description.pt-br:
Nesta história, armas gigantes não identificadas destruíram as grandes cidades do mundo em 2030. Os mentores dessa destruição sem precedentes são conhecidos como “Tokoshie”. Eles se autodenominam armas quando saem para as ruas das cidades com seus poderes avassaladores e desaparecem assim que as destroem. Quase uma década se passa desde então. Uma certa companhia militar está desenvolvendo um drone de combate com habilidade para lutar contra os Tokoshie, e uma certa figura milionária parte em uma jornada subterrânea para descobrir o segredo da vida eterna deles. Outra garota específica parte em uma jornada para lutar contra os Tokoshie, declarados inimigos de seus pais. Em suma, esta é a crônica de uma luta sem limites entre a humanidade e seu maior inimigo de todos os tempos.  


---

  
**Socials & Related**  
[Official Website](https://tokoshie-bullet.com/)  
[Tokoshie × Bullet official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tokoshie_morion)  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/morion_airline?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) | [Author's Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/morion_airline/)  
[Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DEART_Akeji) | [Artist's Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/deart_akeji/)  
[Kodansha Retail Info](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/product?item=0000348980)

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage

altTitles.zh: Dacheng Qi Cai You Ni Xi Xitong

altTitles.en: Only in the Mahayana Period Does the Counterattack System Exist

description.en: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”

Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
description.ru: Касанэ Сибата работает графическим дизайнером в компании, выпускающей детские игрушки. Однажды она случайно... дотронулась до ягодиц своего коллеги, Субару Энокиды, и это напомнило ей о любимом персонаже из детства. Касанэ хочет извиниться перед Субару, не подозревая, что он скрывает...

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

title.en: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru

altTitles.ja: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている

altTitles.en: All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife
I Found a Female Knight in a Rice Field, in the Countryside They Think She’s My Wife

altTitles.th: เพราะดันไปเก็บตกอัศวินหญิงจากท้องนา แถวบ้านเลยลือว่านางเป็นภรรยาของผม ตอนที่
เก็บอัศวินหญิงได้จากท้องนา ตอนที่

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

A slow life in the countryside begins with a beautiful female knight!

(Source: Magazine Pocket)

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10528/episode/349125) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

description.en: In 1946, someone discovered an island where dinosaurs had survived into the present. Through breeding and genetic manipulation, humans managed to increase their population and supercharge their popularity! Until, well... the unfortunate accident, when people's attitudes soured on the idea of visiting dinosaurs. This story follows a rookie zookeeper who is newly hired at Enoshima Dinoland, a struggling dinosaur sanctuary, and the fascinating creatures who need specialized love and care!

altTitles.vi: Ma cà rồng Beru và Hồn ma Aki

description.en: Once on the All Saints' Day vampire Beru and ghost Aki, despite their very different personalities, started living together in a castle. Multiple obstacles and difficulties already waiting on their way. But when they'll know each other better, eventually they'll become the most important companions for one another.

The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!

altTitles.en: I Don’t Even Know Your Name

description.en: Nanase Ayane is a young single mother and an omega. Despite her difficult circumstances, she enjoys a happy peaceful life with her daughter Rin. However, the halcyon days come to an end, when she crosses her path once again with the person who left an unfading mark both on her neck and life five years ago...

An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

When monsters attack the world, a small portion of the population discovers special powers that help them fight these monsters. Of this group, one man stands out above them all. Taehun Kim’s experience as a special forces soldier makes him a deadly hunter of monsters, both human and non-human. But when a magical artifact prophesizes Taehun’s death several years in the future, he must fight to change his fate, and the fate of the world. Can Taehun and his team survive this apocalyptic wasteland?

---

description.fr:
Le monde que nous connaissons n’est plus qu’un lointain souvenir. Sur les ruines de la civilisation, des monstres sont apparus : une fois abattus, ils libèrent des gemmes de pouvoir. Taehoon, un ancien agent des forces spéciales, se retrouve à faire équipe avec Hyunwook, un lycéen et joueur de baseball. Ensemble, ils n’ont qu’un objectif : récupérer le maximum de gemmes de pouvoir pour augmenter leurs capacités, et survivre. La quête des chasseurs a commencé !

---

description.id:
Ketika monster menyerang dunia, beberapa orang mendapatkan kekuatan spesial yang membantu mereka melawan monster ini. Dari kelompok ini, satu orang menonjol di atas mereka semua. Pengalaman Taehoon Kim sebagai prajurit pasukan khusus membuatnya menjadi pemburu monster yang mematikan. Tapi ketika artefak magis meramalkan kematian Taehoon beberapa tahun di masa depan, dia harus berjuang untuk mengubah nasibnya bersamaan dengan nasib dunia. Bisakah Taehoon dan timnya selamat dari akhir dunia?

description.ko:
특수 부대 요원이었던 김태훈, 자동차 워셔액을 사기 위해서 마트에 들어갔다가 몬스터들을 맞닥뜨리게 된다.

살아남기 위해 몬스터들과 싸우며, 고교 야구 선수 방현욱을 만나 몬스터들을 하나씩 처치해 나간다.

죽인 몬스터들의 몸 속에 든 스톤을 얻으면 능력치가 올라가게 되고 점차 능력이 올라갈 수록 이 들은 더욱더 센 몹들을 접하게 되는데...

description.ru:
В один миг, Мир канул в Лету и орда Монстров пришла, чтобы взять контроль над землей, но в этом хаосе пробудилась группа людей, и получила разные способности. Они погрузились в ожесточенную битву, дабы защитить свой дом.

description.zh:
某一天世界灭亡，蹿出了一群怪物掌控整个世界。在这样的末世中，一群人觉醒，并各自获得了不同的特殊能力。他们在斗争中，不断升级，试图挽救世界。即将开启打怪升级的无限乱斗模式…

description.pt-br: O mundo mudou e o povo também. 31 de dezembro de 2016, o dia anterior ao ano novo. Kim Taehoon estava apenas casualmente comprando mantimentos no shopping. Mas então, monstros apareceram de repente do nada. Com suas habilidades altamente treinadas que ele ganhou com sua ocupação anterior, ele começa a caçar os monstros e consegue vencer, salvando inúmeras pessoas que também estavam no shopping. Mas há mais, e eles não param de chegar. Ele seria capaz de sobreviver até o fim? Ele seria capaz de vencer a quantidade incontável de monstros que só parecem ficar mais fortes? E seriam apenas monstros com os quais ele precisa se preocupar? Esta é a história de Kim Tae-Hoon, um dos primeiros caçadores a se levantar durante uma época em que os monstros começaram a aparecer.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: New Testament - Star of the Giants

altTitles.en: New Testament - Hoshi of the Giants

description.en: Mitsuru Hanagata, the genius little league pitcher. He injured his shoulder in a little league match and withdrew from baseball. His shoulder should have healed, but in a match against the a baseball club full of hooligans, he realises that his shoulder is permantly injured. He will never be able to pitch again. So he turns to becoming a genius batter instead!

Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

A space-time that gets weirder as you keep reading.
The tense dialogue between a professor and her assistant in a laboratory brimming with fishy knowledge.
What will the "Plan of the Renaissance of the Human Mind" bring forth?

altTitles.zh-ro: Nanfang De Niao He Beifang De Niao

description.en: The story of a southern sparrow who befriends a northern duck.

description.ja: ネコと暮らす不思議な日常。猫創作マンガ

description.en:
A fan comic posted to r/AzureLane by [u/Cpl\_Ethane](https://www.reddit.com/user/Cpl_Ethane), Akagi^2 is based on the mobile game Azur Lane, which is about anthropomorphised WWII ships.   
This series is focused on Akagi-chan and her antics around the base. Note that this is drawn in an "American newspaper" style, and is read top to bottom, left to right.  
  
Artist's twitter: <https://twitter.com/11975MHz>  
Artist's patreon: <https://patreon.com/CplEFComix>

altTitles.ko: 그 고양이 말고 이 고양이 그냥이냥

description.en:
Nam Yooho loves cats so much that he enrolled in veterinary school. He is now in his third year, and has been having trouble lately. While taking care of Man-deuk, a stray cat, he meets a junior named Ryu Si-an, who appears in his dreams as a cat hybrid and dreams of having sex with him. After being struck by a kinky dream that violates his professional ethics, Yooho tries to avoid Si-an as much as possible...

What the hell are you, and why do you show up as a cat in real life?!

To Hyeon whose life had settled into a grey mind-numbing routine, a discovery in her neighbourhood leads to days where her weariness heals little by little.

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/knitting-room/list?title_no=1754)
- [Official Game](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.loongcheer.unicon.littlecornerteahouse&pcampaignid=web_share)
description.id:
Datanglah ke tempat hangat ini untuk sembuhkan luka hatimu

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/knitting-room/list?title_no=1754)
description.ko:
회색빛 일상에 지쳐있던 현이
어느 날 만나게 된 모퉁이 뜨개방에서 자신의 상처를 마주하며 치유해간다

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/knitting-room/list?title_no=1754)

description.ar:
بعد أن أعيد إحيائه في عالم آخر لموته بسبب كبر العمر، بطل قصتنا "شو" يعيش الآن في ميتم فقير، فيقرر المغامرة كل يوم لأجل مساعدة الميتم، ولتوفير الأكل لأخته وأصدقائه، بالإستعانة بالمهارات التي اكتسبها .  
والآن يعيش حياة عادية هو والبقية ووحوشه الظريفة.
description.en:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)

Catsby, twenty-something nobody, loses his girl-friend to another man. A richer man. His pal Houndu treats him to wine, women and song, but there's no forgetting the lost Persu. The thousand humiliations of youth are poured upon Catsby, who feels far too much to begin with, and whose prospects go from bad to worse.

Now he's petrified by his father, now drunk on the floor, now freaking over a blind-date, now convinced it's all for nothing. And that's just volume one of this groundbreaking new series. No detail however vulgar or delicate is left out as the angst of youth is beautifully dissected.
description.es: “El Gran Catsby va de juventud. Por juventud me refiero al lugar que sin duda queda en la memoria de todas y cada una de las personas. Es el lugar donde uno, a veces, sueña sin fundamento o hiere a otro sin ningún reparo.” dice Doha , el autor de este multipremiado cómic coreano. Y como la juventud, El Gran Catsby es, al mismo tiempo, triste y divertido. En una palabra: emocionante.

description.en: "Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.

description.pl: Od gotowania, przez sprzątanie, po wszystko pomiędzy, Ha-yeon jest idealną pomocą domową! Jest tylko jeden problem... Woojin, który zarabia na życie tłumacząc powieści erotyczne, ciągle widzi swoją gorącą pomoc domową w swoich fantazjach! Może to tylko brak doświadczenia Woojina w sypialni sprawia, że jest sfrustrowany seksualnie, ale musi zająć się tą sytuacją, zanim sprawy wymkną się spod kontroli. Stary przyjaciel Woojina, złośliwy Sol, wysyła mu coś, aby spróbować mu pomóc, ale kiedy Ha-yeon przyłapuje Woojina w najbardziej kompromitującej pozycji z prezentem, czy to szokujące odkrycie będzie zbyt dużym obciążeniem dla nich obojga, aby je udźwignąć?

altTitles.en: Dreams of the Flame Blossoms Fire Flower Night

description.en: The seventh life, finally bloody revenge! Ryu Hee-gyeom, who helped the shaman in trouble, receives five lives. He dies in vain in all five lives, and Ryu Hee-gyeom comes back to life again. In his repeated life, he only wants revenge for the traitor, and due to some variable, he returns to the seventh. His life flows differently from his memory. “Since I got married, whether I kill or live, the queen is now my person.” Somehow, she becomes the only queen of the king and starts to be favored... “If you try to escape, cut off your leg.

altTitles.en: Plaything: The Toy of a Grand Duke

description.en: A robust and naive mercenary, Ilrick, accidentally killed the son of the leader of his unit, who was after Ilrick's body. After he believed that he had successfully concealed his crimes, Ilrick received the summon of an unexpected individual. With flowing silver hair, the individual was the most handsome man Ilrick had ever seen in his life- the Grand Duke of Miros. The duke graced a chillingly beautiful smile on his face as he spoke to Ilrick. "Isn't it only correct for you to be the one asking me to fuck you up?"

Recently, Siwon has been lively. This is because he has fallen inlove with Soyoung, a therapist he had met after receiving physiotherapy. Siwon has appeared quite a few times in front of Soyoung, but Soyoung doesn't give out affection easily. Siwon, who is faced with constant rejection, always keeps a smile on his face. This makes Soyoung look at him with an unknown smile on his face.

title.en: Totsuzen Imouto ni Natta Doukyuusei to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 突然妹になった同級生と同居することになった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Totsuzen imouto ni natta doukyuusei to doukyo suru koto ni natta hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story about Living Together with a Classmate Who Suddenly Became My Younger Sister

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)

description.en: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!

The story begins with Igarashi, who was disqualified as a pro golfer after a certain "incident" and thus moves to Kagoshima Prefecture's Tokara Islands to step out of the limelight. On these islands known as "Japan's last unexplored wilderness," he encounters a naive girl named Tonbo.

As it turns out, these supposedly unexplored islands have a homemade golf course, where Tonbo plays every day. She demonstrates genius-level prowess, playing every kind of shot with just one golf club, a 3-iron. Igarashi is amazed at Tonbo's talent, even as he harbors doubts about her only using a 3-iron. Yet, hidden deep in Tonbo's heart lies a painful, sad past….

After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

title.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Four-Panel Comic: Days of Goddess

altTitles.ja: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 4-koma - Kami-sama no Nichijou

altTitles.en: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 4koma - Days of Goddess

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか4コマ【神様の日常】

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 4koma - Kami-sama no Nichijou

description.en: Adventurers dive into the dangerous dungeon with the help of the <Grace> granted by transcendental existences called Gods. This is the story that covers the hilarious daily life of such Gods and Goddesses and their <Familia>, who are forced to run around on their whims.

Kanade is a trashy man who has bad manners and no concept of money, but lives by trusting only one face.
One day, he runs into his high school junior, Haruka, but his
ex-girlfriend who holds a grudge against Kanade stabs them both with a knife.
Then, when he opened his eyes, he was in the world of an Omegaverse?!
Kanade, who became an omega, couldn't stand it anymore and ended up seducing Alpha Haruka with a flushed face... ?!

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Shadow Gaiden

altTitles.zh: 想要成爲影之實力者-沙雕小劇場

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！ しゃどーがいでん

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Shadow Side Story
I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Shadow Side Story

description.en:
An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leads—shadow garden—as well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!
Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!

A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
description.es:
Japón tiene la mayor tasa de incidencias por ataques de Kaijus de todo el mundo. Los Kaijus irrumpen continuamente y sin piedad en las vidas cotidianas de la gente. Kafka Hibino, que siempre quiso ser un miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa, actualmente trabaja como limpiador de cadáveres de Kaijus.
Sin embargo, un día, una misteriosa criatura convierte a Kafka en un Kaiju, y las Fuerzas de Defensa de Japón, encargados de derrotar a estos monstruos, le identificaron con el nombre clave de “Kaiju N.8”.
description.fr:
Enfant, Kafka Hibino rêvait d’intégrer les Forces de Défense pour combattre ces terribles ennemis, mais après de nombreux échecs à l’examen d’entrée, ce trentenaire travaille à nettoyer les rues de leurs encombrants cadavres. Jusqu’au jour où une mystérieuse créature s’introduit dans son organisme et le métamorphose en une entité surpuissante mi-humaine, mi-kaiju. Son nouveau nom de code : “Kaiju n° 8” !

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ja: 怪獣発生率が世界屈指の日本。この国は、容赦なく怪獣が日常を侵していた。かつて防衛隊員を目指していたが、今は怪獣専門清掃業で働く日比野カフカ。ある日カフカは、謎の生物によって、身体が怪獣化、怪獣討伐を担う日本防衛隊からコードネーム「怪獣8号」と呼ばれる存在になる。
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

description.en:
Entering a new series! The adventure of the strongest demon lord is far from over.  
  
At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world.  
His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils.  
  
A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.  
  
The long-awaited comical sequel of a comic adaptation of the popular fantasy, full of misunderstandings!
description.pt-br: Entrando em uma nova série! A aventura do lorde demônio mais forte está longe de terminar. No andar mais baixo da masmorra, o Lorde Demônio ficou cara a cara com uma presença que parece ser a criadora deste mundo. Seu próximo destino é o território demoníaco, onde há uma rivalidade contínua entre demônios. Uma nova, incrivelmente enérgica e alegre colegial se juntou à gangue. Mais uma vez, as personalidades agitadas do nosso personagem e suas idiossincrasias irão colidir umas com as outras. A aguardada sequência cômica de uma adaptação em quadrinhos da fantasia popular, cheia de mal-entendidos!

altTitles.th: มุกฮยาง ดาร์กเลดี้

description.de: Der einzigartige Kampfkünstler und stolze Herrscher der Dämonensekte, Mookhyang, landet durch einen Fluch der gegnerischen Blutsekte in einer geheimnisvollen Fantasy-Welt. Doch wenn herauskommt, welch unglaubliche Kontrolle Mookhyang über Qi oder Mana hat, ist es nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis er erneut verflucht wird ... und sich in eine junge Frau verwandelt!? Wird die Macht über chinesische Kampfkunst in dieser Welt der Elfen, Magier und Drachen ausreichen, damit ein Mann (oder eine Frau) wieder nach Hause zurückkehren kann? Oder wird dieser arme Krieger letztendlich eine Niederlage erleiden?
description.en:
As the master of the School of Unholy Arts and as the undefeated Unmasked Demon, MookHyang unfortunately falls to a strange fantasy world by the magic of his enemies (School of Blood Arts). In the new world of elf, sorcerer, knight, and dragon, MookHyang’s adventure of finding a way back to his old world (Murim) unfolds.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%8B%A4%ED%81%AC%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EB%94%94/2341)
---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A2%A8%E5%8A%8D%E7%95%99%E9%A6%99/59)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/31401)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-de)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-fr)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AE%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87_%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89/99)
---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/89958058)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=237680077)
description.fr: Mookhyang, pratiquant des arts martiaux et hiérarche de la Secte Démoniaque, se retrouve plongé dans un univers fantastique après avoir été victime d'une malédiction de la part de son ennemi, la Secte du Sang. Mais lorsque les capacités de contrôle du Qi (ou « mana ») de Mookhyang sont révélées au grand jour, ce dernier se retrouve bientôt à nouveau maudit... et transformé en... jeune fille ! Dans cet univers où vivent elfes, mages, chevaliers et dragons, la maîtrise des art martiaux chinois suffira-t-elle à un homme (ou à une « femme » ? ) pour survivre et retrouver le chemin vers un monde ordinaire ? Ou bien cet humble guerrier déclarera-t-il forfait ?
description.ja: 千年に一人の達人「脱魔」の域に達した魔教の教主、墨香。 しかし武林の支配を目論む張仁傑の怪しげな術により異なる世界へ飛ばされてしまう。 言葉も文化も分からない世界で、墨香の孤独な戦いが幕を開ける。
description.ko:
마교의 교주로서 극강의 무공을 자랑하던 묵향은 적들(혈교)에 의해 생전 처음 보는 생소한 이세계(판타지 세계)로 떨어지게 된다. 그곳에서 엘프, 마법사, 기사, 드래곤 등 새로운 존재들과 만나며... 무림 최고수 묵향이 원래 자신의 세상(무림)으로 돌아가기 위해 긴 모험을 떠나게 된다는 스토리.

한국의 무협소설과 판타지 문학을 사랑하는 수많은 독자들이 기다려왔던 초대형 이벤트― 웹툰계를 뒤흔들 다시없을 프로젝트가 시작된다! 
1999년부터 시작된 전설, 누계부수 300만부... 무협소설과 판타지문학을 접목시킨 기념비적인 장르소설인 [묵향]이 드디어 만화화!! 

한국 무협판타지의 한 획을 그었던 전동조 작가의 메가히트 장르소설 [묵향]을 만화화! 만화의 내용은 원작의 2부격인 [다크레이디] 편에서부터 시작한다.

---

description.ru:
Будучи мастером школы темных искусств и непобедимым незыблемым истым демоном, Мукхян, к несчастью, попадает в странный фэнтезийный мир из-за магии своих врагов (школа искусств крови). В новом мире эльфов, колдунов, рыцарей и драконов, разворачивается приключение Мукхяна по поиску пути назад в его старый мир, Мурим.

description.th: มุกฮยาง เจ้าสำนักปีศาจได้ถูกส่งตัวข้ามพิภพมายังโลกใหม่ที่ภาษา, วัฒนธรรมและทุกๆ อย่างได้แตกต่างจากยุทธจักรของเขาอย่างสิ้นเชิง ซ้ำร้ายยังต้องคำสาปให้กลายร่างเป็นเด็กผู้หญิงแสนบอบบางที่เขารังเกียจ แล้วเขาจะหาทางกลับคืนร่างและหวนกลับไปยังยุทธจักรของเขาได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 魔教教主墨香在经历脱胎换骨之后，修道成仙。 却在即将称霸武林之际遭人谋算，被移送至了精灵、魔法师、骑士、龙等生物共存的异世界里，墨香为了重回原来的世界，开始了冒险之旅！
description.pt-br: MookHyang, o mestre da Escola das Artes Profanas e o invencível Demônio Exposto, é infelizmente enviado a um mundo de fantasia estranho pela magia de seus inimigos da Escola das Artes de Sangue. Em um novo mundo com elfos, feiticeiros, cavaleiros e dragões, a aventura de MookHyang em busca de um meio para voltar ao seu velho mundo (Murim) tem início.
description.zh-hk:
身懷絕世武功的魔教教主墨香，被來自血教的敵人
送往生平從未見過的陌生異域(奇幻世界)。
在那裡，他遇上了精靈、魔法師、騎士、龍族...等
前所未聞的人事物。
為了回到原本的世界(武林)，
武林第一人墨香踏上旅程，一場大冒險就此展開!

喜愛韓國武俠小說與奇幻文學的讀者
引頸期盼的超大型活動!
震撼Webtoon界的絕倫企劃正式啟動!
1999年開始連載的傳說之作、累積銷量高達300萬冊...
結合武俠與奇幻的劃時代小說「墨香」，終於漫畫化!!

為韓國奇幻武俠立下全新里程碑的大師級作家
JEON DongZo精心打造的超高人氣小說「墨香」，
終於漫畫化啦!!

漫畫內容由原著第二部《Dark Lady》開展。

description.en:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

description.en:
The girl I fell in love with is… an alien!? I, the class president, happened to fall in love with my classmate, the eccentric Haru. I confessed my feelings, but her true identity was an alien who came to Earth to survey it.

“I still like you!”

I started going out with Haru, but now I have a further “secret” to keep…
description.ja:
好きになった子は、宇宙人？
クラス委員長の僕は、ひょんなことからクラスメイトの変人・ハルに惚れてしまう。意を決して告白した僕だったが、彼女の正体は地球に調査に来た宇宙人だった。「それでも好きだ！」とハルと付き合い始めた僕だったが、さらなる“秘密”を抱えることに――。

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

description.en: "Let's go out with me." While Ki Young Hyun, a timid model student, was leaving school early, the person he bumped into in an alley was Daehan, who was famous for being a bully at school. He was scared and tried to sneak away from him, but he suddenly grabbed his wrist and dragged him into the cafe....
